product_name: Native Eyewear Endo Polarized Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: Relaxin' or playin', these Native Eyewear Endo polarized sunglasses offer unbeatable sun and glare protection. Includes 2 sets of lenses for swapping out when light conditons change.
